at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player gains control of cardname
at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player chooses target player who has more life than they do and is their opponent the first player may have cardname deal n damage to the second player

at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player chooses target player who controls more lands than they do and is their opponent the first player may search their library for a basic land card put that card onto the battlefield then shuffle
at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player loses n life
